data.current_summary: Detach a blog from a multi-language group
data.current_description: Detach a blog from a multi-language group.
data.description_suggestion: Removes a blog from its current multi-language group, converting it to a standalone blog. Requires a blog ID in the request body. After detachment, the blog will no longer be synchronized with other language variants in the group. Returns the updated blog object. This operation cannot be undone without re-attaching the blog to a language group.
data.reasoning: The current description is a mere repetition of the summary with no actionable details. Added clarity on: what the operation does (removes from group, converts to standalone), required inputs (blog ID), side effects (loses synchronization with language variants), return value (updated blog object), and important constraints (irreversibility). This helps AI agents understand the operation's impact and when to use it.

data.current_summary: Attach a blog to a multi-language group
data.current_description: Attach a blog to a multi-language group.
data.description_suggestion: Adds a blog to a multi-language group, enabling synchronization with other language variants. Requires blog ID, target language group ID, and language code in the request body. The blog will be linked to the specified language group and synchronized with other variants. Returns the updated blog object with multi-language group metadata. The blog must not already be attached to another language group.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks essential operational details. Enhanced with: what the operation accomplishes (enables synchronization), required input parameters (blog ID, group ID, language code), side effects (linking and synchronization), return value (updated blog with metadata), and constraints (cannot be already attached). This enables AI agents to understand prerequisites, effects, and appropriate usage scenarios.
